name: Unión Española Fotovoltaica
membership: UNEF is memeber of SolarPower Europe, the European Photovoltaic Industry Association, Global Solar Council, Energy Charter and International Energy Agency.
goal: UNEF is the leading and most representative photovoltaic association in Spain. We represent the whole PV value chain with more than 300 members (R&D, industrial companies, consultancies).
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: ETS, mercado de distribución eléctrica, renovables, generación distribuida, smart cities, autconsumo
